rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0001
rows.name:
Karam Ruins are quite the stimulating
location, wouldn't you agree?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0002
rows.name:
There could be no better place to
perform one of my scripts.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0003
rows.name:
Though it is in a state of some
disrepair... Perhaps it needs a
little fixing up.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0004
rows.name: Hey, Yoshitsune.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0005
rows.name:
How about you shut up
and make dinner?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0006
rows.name:
Trust me, you'll be more use to
everyone cooking than writing those
vapid scripts of yours.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0007
rows.name: How terribly rude.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0008
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0009
rows.name: What recipes are you good at?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0010
rows.name: I'm more interested in the scripts.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0011
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0012
rows.name: What kind of stuff can you cook?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0013
rows.name: Those scripts sound pretty interesting.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0014
rows.name: What shall I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0015
rows.name: Can you make any speciality dishes?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0016
rows.name: I find those scripts most intriguing.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0017
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0018
rows.name: So what kind of food can you make?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0019
rows.name: Those scripts have caught my interest.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0101
rows.name:
Alas... I am surrounded by fools
who think only of their stomachs.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0102
rows.name: Ahahah! Well, can you blame us?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0103
rows.name:
Your food's good! And scripts aren't
going to make us any less hungry!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0104
rows.name:
Though come to think of it,
I'm not sure what kind of recipes
you're actually good at.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0105
rows.name:
Everything you make's so delicious,
I never paid much attention!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0106
rows.name:
That would be because I specifically
cooked all your favorite meals.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0107
rows.name: Huh. Who'd've thunk it.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0108
rows.name:
Dear me... An artist is never
appreciated in his own time.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0109
rows.name:
At any rate, I'm afraid I don't have
any particular specialties.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0110
rows.name:
Though there is one thing
I can't stand to cook.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0111
rows.name: The Avaritia Monkfish.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0112
rows.name:
I cannot begin to imagine how to
create something appetizing from
that...grotesque form.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0113
rows.name: A single look at it makes me queasy.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0114
rows.name:
Hold on. What do its looks
have to do with how it tastes?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0115
rows.name:
Are you dense, girl? Aesthetic appeal
is an integral part of the culinary arts!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0116
rows.name:
How do you expect me to produce
a beautiful creation from such vile
subject matter?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0117
rows.name:
It is a menace! A slayer of appetites!
No sane person would wish to
partake of it!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0118
rows.name:
Its bloated protuberances, its clammy
exterior... Even for a fish, it is hideous!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0119
rows.name:
The mere thought of it sends
a shiver down my spine!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0120
rows.name:
You're coming up with all kinds
of fancy words there...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0121
rows.name:
But basically, you just don't
want to touch it, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0122
rows.name: But of course!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0123
rows.name:
Why should I befoul my artist's hands
with such an abomination?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0124
rows.name:
A fish Yoshitsune won't touch, huh...
Maybe we should ask Homura to
cook one up sometime.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0125
rows.name: Wha-?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0126
rows.name:
Well, even if you can't manage,
Yoshitsune, I bet Homura could make a
tasty meal out of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0127
rows.name: I...see...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0128
rows.name:
When you put it that way, I feel
perhaps it is time I took up this
challenge after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0129
rows.name: Oh? You'll cook one for us, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0130
rows.name:
Yes...I can't be outdone by Homura.
My pride will not allow it!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0131
rows.name:
I can't wait to taste what
you come up with, Yoshitsune!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0132
rows.name: Well, this ought to be fun.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0133
rows.name:
I look forward to tasting
your creation, Yoshitsune.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0134
rows.name:
Well, this'll definitely
be worth a taste!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0135
rows.name: Hahah... Prepare to be amazed.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0201
rows.name:
Thank goodness at least my Driver
possesses some measure of taste.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0202
rows.name:
I was actually just starting on a
script starring you as the hero...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0203
rows.name:
But now, I think I will portray you yet
more flatteringly than I had intended.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0204
rows.name:
You will be the finest of heroes,
master of the pen and the sword alike!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0205
rows.name:
Seriously? Have you forgotten who
you're talking about here?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0206
rows.name:
Benkei... I will depict you as a
worthless glutton with a fondness
for midday naps.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0207
rows.name: Wha-?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0208
rows.name: Hey, I'm not worthless!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0209
rows.name:
Sure, I procrastinate a bit sometimes,
but I kick ass when it counts!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0210
rows.name:
True, but we have an entire
party of formidable fighters.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0211
rows.name:
Including a worthless layabout girl
will add to the variety and make
the story much more entertaining.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0212
rows.name:
That's fine, but you don't
have to model your worthless
layabout girl after me!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0213
rows.name:
I want to give you your chance to shine,
my dear Benkei. It would be tragic
if you were lost amongst the crowd.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0214
rows.name: Then give me a more shiny sort of role!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0215
rows.name:
The role of worthless layabout glutton
is not to your liking?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0216
rows.name:
The role of worthless layabout glutton
is to my extreme disliking!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0217
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0218
rows.name:
Then Rex, I will give you the role of
the worthless layabout glutton instead.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0219
rows.name: How about no?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0220
rows.name:
Then Nia, I will give you the role of
the worthless layabout glutton instead.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0221
rows.name: Oh, HELL no.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0222
rows.name:
Then Meleph, I will give you the role of
the worthless layabout girl instead.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0223
rows.name:
I fear I may be a little old for that
position. Besides which, would the plot
progress with a layabout for the hero?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0224
rows.name:
Then Zeke, I will give you the role of
the worthless layabout glutton who is
past his prime, instead.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0225
rows.name:
Who're you calling past his prime?!
And what kind of hero would that be?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0226
rows.name: Dear me... You are all so picky.
